metadata.name: The Adventures of Mickey & Maj
metadata.description: Mickey (Michael James Hawthorne), is an average seven-year-old boy who’s been stuck in his bedroom on a time-out all day. Maj (Majestic) is a talking, flying, ancient Magic Carpet that’s been stuck in the attic on a time-out for years. This is the story of how they meet. We learn about Maj, his ability to travel through space, time, and dimensions! We learn of his mysterious origin, The Weaver, The Tapestry! An evil Egyptian god shows up! We also see Mickey stuff a PB&J into is open maw. The adventure begins here!
